subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt anchored a Jamaican relay team to a 4x100 victory in a Diamond League meet in the Olympic Stadium, exactly a year after the start of the Summer Games in London.
snippet: Usain Bolt anchored a Jamaican relay team to a 4x100 victory in a Diamond League meet in the Olympic Stadium, exactly a year after the start of the Summer Games in London.
